headline: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) Shares Surge 33% Over Past Month Despite Earnings Decline
summary: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) recently unveiled its Security Monitoring and Response service, aiming to enhance industrial cyber resilience amid a modest second-quarter earnings report showing declines across key metrics. Despite a tepid financial performance with reduced revenue and income, shares soared 33% over the past month, potentially buoyed by an updated earnings guidance that offered a more optimistic EPS range. This contrasts with broader market trends where major indices were...

headline: Rockwell Automation to Present at Wolfe’s 18th Annual Global Transportation & Industrials Conference
summary: MILWAUKEE, May 09, 2025--Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK) Chairman and CEO, Blake Moret, and SVP and CFO, Christian Rothe, will present at Wolfe’s 18th Annual Global Transportation & Industrials Conference on Wednesday, May 21, 2025, in New York.

headline: Spotting Winners: Trimble (NASDAQ:TRMB) And Internet of Things Stocks In Q1
summary: As the Q1 earnings season wraps, let’s dig into this quarter’s best and worst performers in the internet of things industry, including Trimble (NASDAQ:TRMB) and its peers.
